input.sentences: we stayed at this condo for vacation .
the first place we hit was the pool .
my boyfriend relaxed with a beer .
he did fall asleep and get an uncomfortable sun tan .
at night the boats were all lit up .
output.sentences: On vacation last year we stayed in a condo.
The pool was a big hit.
I relaxed with my boyfriend and drank some beer
This sun tan is very uncomfortable.
At night the water is lit by light from the boats.
